seed_pair.target: Desearía que no tocaran música tan alta.
seed_pair.known: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.

S0547: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.
Because he has been playing in the mud.
S0548: Me estoy sintiendo triste en este momento.
I am feeling sad at the moment.
S0549: Because I have got to be quiet.
S0552: La iglesia al otro final del pueblo es fea.
The church at the other end of the village is ugly.
S0553: Creo que la iglesia pequeña es muy fea.
I think the small church is very ugly.
S0555: Y estoy demasiado cansado para traer una nueva.
And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.
S0556: Tocan música tarde en la noche.
They play music late at night.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
